directions: Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil.  Add peeled and cut potatoes; cook until tender but still firm, about 15 minutes. Drain, and transfer to a large bowl. Add onions.
In a large bowl, whisk together the  mayonnaise, oil, vinegar, sugar, parsley, salt and pepper. Gently stir in the potatoes and onion.  Let stand for 1 hour before serving to enhance flavors.
title: Octoberfest German Potato Salad
